note:
Roboticist | Automation Systems Engineer | Security Analyst

Professor of ?????. Stay tuned. 🧙‍♂️.

Developing my own language/runtime/shell/operating system...thing.

I tend to break things, 𝘶𝘴𝘶𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺 for the greater good.

--

I ran a robotics company for seven years, started a startup or two before that, including one of the first social analytics companies, had over a million followers back when being an "influencer" wasn't even a thing (proto-fluencer?), made some bad music, and work as a net/op security contractor for the government and others, and yet, sadly, my legacy will likely be one of three things: glitter coffee, the dress meme, and... homeowner has a 'meow' in it.

I remain truly proud of crafting fundraising and coordination software for nonprofits and grassroot organizations, and helping raise significant funds for progressives in tough-to-reach areas across the US in 2016.

I also used to be a script kiddie, I still am—but I used to be one, too
